H0.text: 206 is the number of bones in an adult skeleton.

H1.text: 208 bones are found in an adult skeleton.

H2.text: 196 bones make up an adult skeleton.

H3.text: 192 is the number of bones in an adult skeleton.

A4.text: The human skeleton is composed of around 270 bones at birth â€“ this total decreases to around 206 bones by adulthood after some bones get fused together.
